name: my-morning-jacket
title: My Morning Jacket
subtitle: An iOS app for the famous band
synopsis: An early solo project at the Mechanism, I built out an iPhone application for the popular band My Morning Jacket. Built on [Titanium Appcelerator](https://www.appcelerator.com/Titanium/), it allowed fans to get basic info about the band with a fun photo filter to boot. The application is no longer available on the App Store.
